entities.description: Instances of using prescription stimulants in larger amounts or for a longer time than meant.
Instances of having a strong urge to use any prescription stimulants.
Instances of needing a lot more stimulants than used before to get the desired feeling.

relationships.description: Indicates instances where the respondent used prescription stimulants inappropriately.
Relates to the respondent having a strong urge to use prescription stimulants.
Indicates instances where the respondent needed to use more stimulants to achieve the same effect.
